yaml.title: MSDM Career & Program Guide
yaml.subtitle: for Master of Science in Digital Marketing Program at Cal Poly Pomona
yaml.description: Overview of the website contents: Course registration, job outlook, career guide, scholarship, certificates, and student club

markdown.markdown:
![](images/msdm-crosswalk.png){fig-alt="a group of students walking on the crosswalk" fig-align="center"}


This is a companion website for the [Master of Science in Digital Marketing Program](https://www.cpp.edu/programs/cba/gp/masters-digital-marketing.shtml), [Singelyn Graduate School of Business](https://www.cpp.edu/cba/sgsb/graduate-program.shtml) at [Cal Poly Pomona](https://www.cpp.edu/). The university is [highly ranked](https://www.cpp.edu/aboutcpp/rankings.shtml) for diversity, social mobility, and ROI. This site is maintained by the Director of the program to provide students with career guidance. Please direct all the questions to [Dr. Jae Jung](https://www.cpp.edu/faculty/jmjung/index.shtml).

## **Objectives:**

Your MSDM journey is filled with opportunities to grow, learn, and prepare for impactful careers in Digital Marketing and Marketing Analytics. This homepage serves as your starting point—linking you to the skills, tools, pathways, and experiences that will shape your professional future. Explore each section to discover how to build your capabilities and chart a meaningful career direction.

## **Built Around What Learners Value Most**

Based on national research with professionals across the insights and data industry, we designed this program around the five qualities students value most when choosing a post-baccalaureate program:

1.  Faculty who understand industry needs,

2.  Practical hands-on learning,

3.  Curriculum that adapts to a changing market,

4.  Strong professional connections, and

5.  Access to advanced research infrastructure.

## **Important Dates for Spring 2026** {#important-dates-2026sp}

-   Add/Drop Period: January 5 - January 30

-   New Student Orientation at SGSB: January 14

-   Last day to drop and receive 100% refund: January 16

-   Classes begin for all students: Saturday, **January 17**

-   Census Day: February 13

-   The deadline to apply for Spring 2026 graduation ([Details for Graduaton Application](https://www.cpp.edu/registrar/graduation/applying-for-graduation.shtml))

    -   **Primary Deadline:** March 13, 2026, for inclusion in commencement/program, through BroncoDirect.

    -   **Late Applications:** Possible until the last day of the term, but without ceremony/program benefits. 

-   Spring Break: Saturday, **March 28** - April 3

-   SGSB Hooding & Graduation Ceremony: May 9 at Rose Garden & CLA Paseo

-   Finals: May 9 - 15

-   Commencement Ceremony: May 17

-   Gradues Due: May 22, 9:00 am

-   **Holidays**

    -   Martin Luther King Jr. Day: January 19

    -   Cesar Chavez Day: March 31

## **Important Dates for Summer 2026** {#important-dates-2026sum}

-   Priority Registration Period: March 9 - 10

-   General Registration Period: March 12 - May 6

-   Add/Drop Period: May 13 - June 10

-   Last day to drop and receive 100% refund: June 2

-   Classes begin for all students: Wednesday, **June 3**

-   Census Day: June 29

-   Finals: August 10 - 14

-   Gradues Due: August 17, 9:00 am

-   **Holidays**

    -   Juneteenth: June 19

    -   Independence Day: July 3

## **Website Organization**

1.  **Application**

    1.  [Introduction](application.qmd#introduction)

    2.  [Video Presentation about the Program & Curriculum](application.qmd#video-presentation-msdm)

    3.  [Apply Checklist](application.qmd#apply-checklist)

    4.  [University Overview](application.qmd#university-overview)

    5.  [Colleges & Program Overview](application.qmd#colleges-program-overview)

    6.  [Target Digital Marketing Career Roles](application.qmd#target-digital-marketing-career-roles)

    7.  [Curriculum & Completion Roamap Options](application.qmd#curriculum-completion-roadmap-options)

    8.  [Key Features and Costs](application.qmd#key-features-cost)

    9.  [Prograam Support Environment](application.qmd#program-support-environment)

    10. [More Information & Contacts](application.qmd#more-information-contacts)

    11. [Frequently Asked Questions](application.qmd#frequently-asked-questions)

2.  **Career Outlook & Guide**

    1.  **Career Options, Outlook, and Salary**

        1.  [Career Outlook](career_outlook_salary_digital_marketing.qmd#career-outlook)

        2.  [Typical Job Roles in Digital Marketing](career_outlook_salary_digital_marketing.qmd#typical-job-titles)

        3.  [Active Digital Marketing Job Postings](career_outlook_salary_digital_marketing.qmd#active-job-postings)

        4.  [Digital Marketing & Analytics Job Outlook](career_outlook_salary_digital_marketing.qmd#digital-marketing-analytics-job-outlook)

            1.  [Job Growth Rate, Volume, and Salary](career_outlook_salary_digital_marketing.qmd#job-growth-rate-volume-and-salary)

            2.  [Understanding the Job Categories](career_outlook_salary_digital_marketing.qmd#understanding-the-job-categories)

            3.  [Key Observations](career_outlook_salary_digital_marketing.qmd#key-observations)

            4.  [Key Trends](career_outlook_salary_digital_marketing.qmd#key-trends)

            5.  [Understanding the "Data Tier" in Marketing](career_outlook_salary_digital_marketing.qmd#understanding-the-data-tier-in-marketing)

            6.  [Key Financial Insights](career_outlook_salary_digital_marketing.qmd#key-financial-insights)

    2.  **Career Preparation Guide**

        1.  [Career Guidance for Internatoinal Students](career_prep_digital_marketing_marketing_analytics.qmd#career-guidance-for-international-students)

        2.  Digital Marketing Strategy Execution Jobs

            -   [Skills and Knowledge for DMS Careers](career_prep_digital_marketing_marketing_analytics.qmd#skills-and-knowledge-for-dms-careers)

            -   [Common DMS Job Titles and Career Readiness](career_prep_digital_marketing_marketing_analytics.qmd#common-digital-marketing-job-titles-career-readiness)

            -   [How to Prepare for DMS Careers](career_prep_digital_marketing_marketing_analytics.qmd#how-to-prepare-for-dms-careers)

        3.  Marketing Analytics Jobs

            -   [Skills and Knowledge for MA Careers](career_prep_digital_marketing_marketing_analytics.qmd#skills-and-knowledge-for-analytics-careers)

            -   [Comparisons between MA Job Roles](career_prep_digital_marketing_marketing_analytics.qmd#marketing-analysts-vs.-marketing-data-scientists-comparisons)

        4.  On-Campus Support Resources

            -   [Career Center](career_prep_digital_marketing_marketing_analytics.qmd#career-center)

            -   [CBA Career Hub](career_prep_digital_marketing_marketing_analytics.qmd#cba-career-hub)

            -   [Micro-Internships](career_prep_digital_marketing_marketing_analytics.qmd#micro-internships)

        5.  Extra-Curricular Opportunities

            -   [OptiMark Digital Marketing & Analytics Society](career_prep_digital_marketing_marketing_analytics.qmd#optimark-digital-marketing-analytics-society)

3.  **MSDM Onboarding Guide**

    1.  [Key Actions You Must Take Soon after Your Admission](curriculum_contract.qmd#key-actions-you-must-take-soon-after-your-admission)

    2.  [Essential On-Campus Websites](curriculum_contract.qmd#essential-on-campus-websites)

    3.  [Step 1: Start Filling out **Curriculum Contract Form**](curriculum_contract.qmd#appointment-for-curriculum-contract)

        -   **Curriculum Contract Form**

    4.  [Step 2: Know the Curriculum (Degree Emphasis) Options](curriculum_contract.qmd#curriculum-new-curriculum)

    5.  [Step 3: Know Curriculum Completion Roadmap Options](curriculum_contract.qmd#curriculum-roadmaps)

    6.  [Step 4: Which Curriculum Option to Choose?](curriculum_contract.qmd#factors-to-consider-when-choosing-degree-emphasis)

    7.  [Step 5: Which Completion Roadmap to Choose?](curriculum_contract.qmd#choosing-a-1-year-vs.-2-year-roadmap)

    8.  [Step 6: Complete Your Roadmap Worksheet](curriculum_contract.qmd#plan-your-roadmap-with-worksheets)

    9.  [Step 7: Submit Curriculum Contract Form and Roadmap Worksheet to Your Advisor](curriculum_contract.qmd#submit-curriculum-contract-and-roadmap-worksheet)

    10. [Step 8: Register for Courses](curriculum_contract.html#register-for-courses)

4.  **Course Registration**

    1.  [Before You Register: What Every MSDM Student Should Know](course_registration.qmd)

    2.  [Curriculum](course_registration.qmd#curriculum)

    3.  [Boot Camp](course_registration.qmd#boot-camp)

    6.  [Year 1, Summer](course_registration.qmd#year-1-summer)

    7.  [Year 2, Fall](course_registration.qmd#year-2-fall)

    8.  [Year 2, Spring](course_registration.qmd#year-2-spring)

    9.  [Year 2, Summer](course_registration.qmd#year-2-summer)

5.  **Skills & Tools**

    1.  **Boot Camp**

        1.  [Spreadsheet Skills](msdm_bootcamp.qmd#spreadsheet-skills)

        2.  [R Programming and Statistics](msdm_bootcamp.qmd#r-programming-and-statistics)

    2.  **Skills • Tools • Courses Alignment**

        1.  [Tools and Skills along the Student Learning Journey](skills_tools_courses.qmd#tools-and-skills-along-the-student-learning-journey)

        2.  [Project Management Tools](skills_tools_courses.qmd#project-management-tools)

        3.  [Popular Video Editing Tools for Windows](skills_tools_courses.qmd#popular-video-editing-tools-for-windows)

        4.  [Popular Video Editing Tools for Mac](skills_tools_courses.qmd#popular-video-editing-tools-for-mac)

        5.  [SQL (Structured Query Language)](skills_tools_courses.qmd#sql-structured-query-language)

        6.  [**Certifications**](skills_tools_courses.qmd#certifications)

        7.  [CCIDM Virtual Workshops](skills_tools_courses.qmd#ccidm-workshops)

        8.  [DataCamp Virtual Classroom](skills_tools_courses.qmd#datacamp-virtual-classroom)

6.  **Capstone Project (MSDM Culminating Experience Project)** - A Required Year-Long Project

    1.  [How to Manage Expectations](capstone_project.qmd#how-to-manage-expectations)

    2.  [Project Milestones and Timelines](capstone_project.qmd#project-milestones-and-timelines)

    3.  [How to Choose a Project](capstone_project.qmd#how-to-choose-a-project)

    4.  [Fall Semester](capstone_project.qmd#fall-semester)

    7.  [Summer Semester](capstone_project.qmd#summer-semester)

7.  **Scholarships**

    1.  Recruitment Scholarship

    2.  Professional Development Scholarship

    3.  Merit-Based Scholarship

    4.  LOGRAR/PPOHA Grant

    6.  Healthcare Communications & Marketing Scholarships

## **About the Website:**

This is a companion website for the [Master of Science in Digital Marketing Program](https://www.cpp.edu/programs/cba/gp/masters-digital-marketing.shtml), [Singelyn Graduate School of Business](https://www.cpp.edu/cba/sgsb/graduate-program.shtml) at [Cal Poly Pomona](https://www.cpp.edu/). The university is [highly ranked](https://www.cpp.edu/aboutcpp/rankings.shtml) for diversity, social mobility, and ROI. This site is maintained by the Director of the program to provide students with career guidance. Please direct all the questions to [Dr. Jae Jung](https://www.cpp.edu/faculty/jmjung/index.shtml).

## **Objectives:**

Your MSDM journey is filled with opportunities to grow, learn, and prepare for impactful careers in Digital Marketing and Marketing Analytics. This homepage serves as your starting point—linking you to the skills, tools, pathways, and experiences that will shape your professional future. Explore each section to discover how to build your capabilities and chart a meaningful career direction.

## **Built Around What Learners Value Most**

Based on national research with professionals across the insights and data industry, we designed this program around the five qualities students value most when choosing a post-baccalaureate program:

1.  Faculty who understand industry needs,

2.  Practical hands-on learning,

3.  Curriculum that adapts to a changing market,

4.  Strong professional connections, and

5.  Access to advanced research infrastructure.
